title: Girona 3-0 Real Valladolid: Michel´s side emphatic as they return to winning ways
description: Girona snapped their six-game winless run across all competitions after cruising to a 3-0 home win over relegation-threatened Real Valladolid. Goals from David Lopez, Abel Ruiz and Arnaut Danjuma wrapped up the three points as Girona moved up to eighth place with 25 points. The hosts dominated proceedings from the start and took the lead […] The post Girona 3-0 Real Valladolid: Michel´s side emphatic as they return to winning ways appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Verona 0-1 Milan: Reijnders strike eases pressure on Fonseca
description: Tijjani Reijnders’ second-half strike proved decisive as Milan edged to a 1-0 win over Verona in a keenly contested Serie A clash on Friday. After failing to win their last two league matches, Milan moved up to seventh in the table with a much-needed three points.
